title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2171.4 - Monitoring and submitting performance reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2171.4 - Monitoring and submitting performance reports

State Regulations

Nothing in this section will relieve the grantee of its
continuing responsibility to monitor and submit performance reports regarding
the requirements for occupancy of a home or project, even though project
close-out has taken place. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2171.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
